name: King's Cup - ABDI
description:
This is the most popular social party game known as Kings game. Each card has own enjoyable rules. Players actions and drinks are associated with the card that they randomly select each turn.


All you have to do is download the application and start the game ..

Have fun...

Features:
-Create and Play With Your Own Rules.
-Show Card Rules on Game Screen.
-Online Game Rules
-Power options.

Note: You can see game-defined rules by holding down on the cards you are pulling.
